title: How to Craft a Dog Collar from an Old Shirt

steps.headline: Measure your dog's neck.
steps.description: Find an old collared shirt with the approximate size of your dog's neck.

steps.headline: Unpick the the collar from the shirt at the neckline.
steps.description: If you want, you can cut off the collar. Afterwards, you will have to sew a hem around the cut edge. This is to prevent it from fraying.

steps.headline: To use the collar, simply button it around the dog's neck.
Embellish the neck line with trim using fabric glue.
Glue jewels onto the collar.
steps.description: This is perfect for the pampered pooch who loves a bit of sparkle! Adorning your pet’s collar with a small sprinkle of jewels will definitely add an instant glamour to your daily dog walk.

steps.headline: Glue a ribbon onto the back of your dog's collar, bring the leftovers around the front of it, then tie into a bow.
steps.description: This will definitely give a "proper" look to your dog's homemade collar. Be sure to do this after you have buttoned the collar.

steps.headline: You're done!
steps.description: Now your dog will have a cute collar to show off while it's on its daily walks!

text: Making the Collar Measure your dog's neck. Find an old collared shirt with the approximate size of your dog's neck. Unpick the the collar from the shirt at the neckline. If you want, you can cut off the collar. Afterwards, you will have to sew a hem around the cut edge. This is to prevent it from fraying. To use the collar, simply button it around the dog's neck.  Designing the Collar Embellish the neck line with trim using fabric glue.  Glue jewels onto the collar. This is perfect for the pampered pooch who loves a bit of sparkle! Adorning your pet’s collar with a small sprinkle of jewels will definitely add an instant glamour to your daily dog walk. Glue a ribbon onto the back of your dog's collar, bring the leftovers around the front of it, then tie into a bow. This will definitely give a "proper" look to your dog's homemade collar. Be sure to do this after you have buttoned the collar. You're done! Now your dog will have a cute collar to show off while it's on its daily walks!
